meta.name: description
meta.content: CheshireCat is a BEP20 token with static farming, deflationary and has auto-liquidity functions. It penalises sellers while rewarding the long term holders. It is made for the community as the developers renounce the ownership.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: CheshireCat is a BEP20 token with static farming, deflationary and has auto-liquidity functions. It penalises sellers while rewarding the long term holders. It is made for the community as the developers renounce the ownership.

CheshireCat is a BEP20 token with static farming, deflationary and has auto-liquidity functions. It penalises sellers while rewarding the long term holders. It is made for the community as the developers renounce the ownership.

div.h1: CheshireCat is a BEP20 decentralized meme community token with static farming, deflationary and LP.
div.div: It penalises sellers while rewarding the long term holders. Welcome to the MAD TEA PARTY.
10% total tax - 5% is distributed to all holders and 5% goes back into liquidity pool which in turns brings the Ô∏èfloor price up to prevent huge dumps.

The road of this token will be 100% dictated by the community. The community will even set the liquidity and distribution fees!
0 TEAM TOKENS
0 MARKETING TOKENS
NO MINTING FUNCTION

div.h2: On each transaction CheshireCat protocol automatically distributes rewards to holders and liquidity pool.
div.div: üí≤ Simply hold CheshireCat in your wallet and you will get more.

li.div:
Metamask is a crypto wallet & gateway to blockchain that can be used to trade on the Binance Smart Chain.
Get it for free at the Metamask official website.
2. Connect your MetaMask to Binance Smart Chain
Buy Binance Coin (BNB) from Binance.com or Binance.us then withdraw to your Metamask.

div.div: Go to this link at PancakeSwap and accept the pop-up message.
Click "Select a currency" and enter this contract address into the search field, and you should be able to find CheshireCat.
Click on the and set the slippage to between 11-12%.

li.div: How much CheshireCat do you want to purchase? set it and press the swap button.

footer.p: Cheshire Cat invites you to the Mad Tea Party. This grizzly furry ball invades the BSC to be called a token and strives for transparency and fairness as Cat wants no tokens for meowself. üí∏TAXüü£ 5% added to Liquidity Pool 5% Reflected to all holders during buy&sell

0 TEAM TOKENS
0 MARKETING TOKENS
NO MINTING FUNCTION

Built with üß° by the community for the community.
